channel.title: CVE Feed for SysBasics -- Shortcode For Elementor Templates
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SysBasics -- Shortcode For Elementor Templates

item.title: CVE-2024-48022|2024-10-17T13:01:22.931Z -- sysbasics -- shortcode%20for%20elementor%20templates
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in SysBasics Shortcode For Elementor Templates allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Shortcode For Elementor Templates: from n/a through 1.0.0.
